text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After our training session, I spy a rare<n>sight—Sakura
Bakushin O completely<n>engrossed in her phone with a sour<n>
expression on her face.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hnngh... Why...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Th-this has got to be a test... There's<n>no other explanation!
A trial I must<n>overcome to take my place as the<n>ultimate
class representative!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But... But... AAARGH!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer! Nothing much, just the<n>dread of waiting in line!
choice_data_list: I'm gonna need more than that.
I'm gonna need more than that.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There's this dessert that I want to<n>buy, but it's really,
REALLY popular.<n>You have to stand in line for hours<n>just
for the chance to buy it...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But I hate, hate, HATE waiting in<n>lines! What am I supposed
to do?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Do I force myself to suffer the agony<n>of long lines... or do I
refuse to submit<n>myself to torture and give up on<n>delicious
treats?! Gaaah, it's not<n>faaair!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I nod along as she explains her<n>predicament. I can't picture
her<n>patiently waiting in line either. But<n>perhaps if she had
someone to talk<n>to...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Wait, do you want sweets too? Then<n>who am I to deny
you?! Having you<n>there will surely make the line<n>bearable
as well!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
My parents always say, "It's not<n>where you go—it's who
you travel<n>with!" I never understood what they<n>meant until
now!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If you're joining me, why don't we<n>plan to go on our next
day off?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The appointed date comes, and we<n>arrive at the shop. We
quickly get in<n>line, but before long, I notice Sakura<n>
Bakushin O beginning to fidget.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hngh... Hnnngh!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
One... Two sparrows! Three pigeons,<n>and one excellent
class<n>representative.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And... ONE missing trainer! Wait,<n>that's not right! Where are
you,<n>Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Th-there you are! Thank<n>goodness, I was starting to
get<n>worried. Phew...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's been... one minute since we<n>started waiting. The line
has barely<n>moved, and Sakura Bakushin O is<n>clearly
agitated.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps a conversation would help<n>take her mind off the
line.
choice_data_list: What are you going to buy?
what are you going to buy?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oho! An excellent question, my dear<n>trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The cheesecake here is said to fly off<n>the shelves it's so
fast! Isn't that<n>amazing?! I had no idea cakes could<n>fly!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If I can sink my teeth into that speedy<n>treat, I'm sure to
become the fastest<n>Umamusume, right?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That's why I MUST get my hands on<n>this cheesecake! It is
vital to my<n>journey to become the greatest class<n>
representative and role model to<n>Umamusume everywhere!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O seems convinced<n>that this dessert will
magically make<n>her faster. I look around for some<n>way to
explain the rumors to her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My gaze stops on a signboard in<n>front of the shop. Next to
the picture of<n>their cheesecake are the words "Best<n>
Seller!"
choice_data_list:
I think they're flying off the shelves because
they're popular...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, silly Trainer! What does being<n>popular have to do with
flying?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I wonder what a flying cheesecake is<n>going to look like...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Maybe a bird? Or a plane?! Ormaybe... Gasp!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps they heard about how I SOAR<n>down the track and
modeled it after<n>me! Hehehe... What a naughty<n>bakery!
They should've asked<n>permission!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As we continue to make small talk,<n>the line moves forward,
ever so<n>steadily.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And THAT is how I managed tobring the little lost puppy back to itsowner!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Heh, a speedy rescue worthy of the<n>class representative! If
you ever need<n>anything, Trainer, don't hesitate to—

text_block_list.name: Bakery Staff
text_block_list.text:
All right, just a moment, folks. We'll<n>be ready to serve you
in a jiffy!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What the—how did we get to the front<n>of the building so
fast?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Is this some kind of miracle?! Are the<n>heavens thanking me
for my service<n>as class representative?!
choice_data_list: Time flies when you're having fun.
Time flies when you're having fun.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
N-now that you mention it, I wasn't<n>paying attention to the
line at all when<n>we were talking!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Did you know this was going to<n>happen, Trainer?! Is that
why you kept<n>me talking?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe you'd come up with<n>such a genius plan just
for me!<n>You're in a league all your own!
choice_data_list: That's right! Witness my TRUE POWER!
That's right! Witness my TRUE POWER!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I can officially vouch for your<n>strategic prowess!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If the heavens chose me to be the<n>class representative,
then YOU were<n>chosen to be a trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
For us both to have met in this life...<n>How could it be
anything less than<n>fate—
choice_data_list: Hey, we're at the front of the line.
Hey, we're at the front of the line.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wait, what?! The time flew by so fast<n>AGAIN!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Anyway! Let's grab us some<n>cheesecake!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Cheesecakes in hand, we make our<n>way back to the
academy, where we<n>chow down on the delicious treat.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That was fantastic! Now, pull out that<n>stopwatch, Trainer! I
wanna see how<n>much faster I got!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Here I go... Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer... I... I can feel it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You don't have to say anything. I can<n>already tell—I'm the
fastest<n>Umamusume alive!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I glance down at my watch, which<n>displays the same time
as always...
choice_data_list:
Your start was amazing! But your time's the
same...

Your start was amazing! But your time's the
same...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What?! B-but how... Ah, wait a minute!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It must be because I went for a run<n>right after eating! We'll
have to try<n>again later!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Phew... But what a great day. We got<n>those flying
cheesecakes, and I<n>managed to conquer my hatred of<n>
lines!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And none of it would've been<n>possible without you! That's
right, the<n>humble class representative always<n>gives credit
where credit is due!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The next time I have to stand in line<n>for anything, I hope to
make use of<n>your strategic genius once again!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Satisfied, Sakura Bakushin O takes a<n>break before going for
another run.<n>Unfortunately, her time remains<n>unchanged...
